result.title: Initializing 2d Array
result.content:
I have been trying to figure out on initializing a dynamically declared 2d array. Following code gives a segmentation fault.

int **ancr = new int *[n+1];
 for(int i=0;i<n+1;i++)
     ancr[i] = new int [n+1];
 memset(ancr,-1,sizeof(ancr));
 for(int i=0;i<n+1;i++)
    {for(int j=0;i<n+1;i++)
        {cout<<ancr[i][j]<<" ";}
    cout<<endl;}
/*--------------------------------------------------*/
 int **ancr = new int *[n+1];
 for(int i=0;i<n+1;i++)
    ancr[i] = new int [n+1];

makes only first element as -1.

Any solutions?
